execution_plan.description: Find the customer id(s) for customers whose last name is 'Logan'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE lastname = 'Logan';

execution_plan.description: Get all receipt IDs that include an item named 'croissant'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE LOWER(Item) = 'croissant';

execution_plan.description: Retrieve receipt numbers for receipts that belong to the customer(s) from step 1 and are in the receipts that include a croissant from step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId IN ($step1.id) AND ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);
